      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> registerService(@RequestBody at.jku.swe.simcomp.commons.registry.dto.ServiceRegistrationConfigDTO configDTO) throws AdaptorAlreadyRegisteredException

      Parameters:
      configDTO - the config.
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating the success of the operation
      Throws:
      AdaptorAlreadyRegisteredException - if an adaptor with the same name is already registered.
